postSquarePaymentOrderCurrent.title: New Order
postSquarePaymentOrderCurrent.body: Thank you for your order with Ref #{order.displayId}. It's been submitted and we'll keep you in the loop on it.

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCanceled.title: Order Cancelled
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCanceled.body: Order Ref #{order.displayId} has been canceled. Please reach out to the store you have questions.

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCompleted.title: Order Complete
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCompleted.body: Great news! Order Ref #{order.displayId} is complete. Enjoy!

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateFailed.title: Order Failed
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateFailed.body: Oops! There was an issue with Order Ref #{order.displayId}. Please contact the store.

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdatePrepared.title: Order Ready
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdatePrepared.body: Order Ref #{order.displayId} is prepared and ready. See you soon!

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateProposed.title: Order Received
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateProposed.body: Your order with Ref #{order.displayId} has been successfully received by the location.

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateReserved.title: Order in Progress
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateReserved.body: Order Ref #{order.displayId} is currently in progress. Sit tight!
